attributes.action: revoke the independence of the United States of America
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
In the light of their failure to elect a competent President of the USA and thus to govern themselves, we hereby request the revocation of American independence.

Her Sovereign Majesty Queen Elizabeth II will resume monarchical duties over all states, commonwealths and other territories.

reasons: Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
